item.description:
BIG HOLIDAY WEEKEND PARTY! GOOD FRIDAY Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility

FRIDAY APRIL 10, 2009 at 7:30 pm

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away â€“Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

* Specialty Pizza
* Pasta
* Salad
* Rolls

* DJ Johnny Plays Your Requests*

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 to Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)

The Party starts at 7:30 pm

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $15
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $20 only at http://www.CentralCTS...

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $ 7.50 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group

Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!

For the health and safety of our guests, we do NOT use lasers, smoke or fog machines.
item.how_to_find_us: Use back parking lot and the Banquet Entrance, look for CentralCTSingles signs

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
